CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 1, 1954, pg. 17, reads: "Heagy - Spalding Inquest Scenes - Officer Heagy's Partners - Patrolman George Shumacker, right, who, with Officer Heagy, investigated they report of a gunman terrorizing people along Fullerton Street, which resulted in Heagy being fatally shot in back, talks with (left to right) William Noel and Rudolph Dockal who aided in the capture of Spalding. - All Photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of three police officers, from left: William Noel, Rudolph Dockal, and patrolman George Shumacker, posed in interior at Heagy - Spalding inquest
